Add setter and getter for request timeout on the ClientUpgradeRequest in the same style as the methods onorg.eclipse.jetty.client.api.Request.

nodes.bodyText: Use 2 * timeout to wait - if all good we are still waiting just timeout, but at least we won't have unexpected failures when 200 ms is too short of a margin.
To be consistent with other methods of this class, this should be `void setTimeout(long, TimeUnit).
